faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our furniture and services

items.question: Do you offer custom furniture design?
items.answer: Yes, we specialize in custom furniture design. Our expert craftsmen can create unique pieces tailored to your specific requirements, space, and style preferences.

items.question: What is your delivery timeframe?
items.answer: Delivery timeframes vary by product. Ready-made items can be delivered within 2-3 days in Mumbai, while custom pieces typically take 2-4 weeks depending on complexity.

items.question: Do you provide installation services?
items.answer: Yes, we provide professional installation services for all our furniture. Our experienced team ensures proper assembly and placement in your space.

items.question: What warranty do you offer?
items.answer: We offer comprehensive warranties ranging from 3-10 years depending on the product. All our furniture comes with manufacturing defect coverage and quality guarantees.

items.question: Can I see products before purchasing?
items.answer: Absolutely! We encourage customers to visit our Mumbai showroom to see and feel our furniture firsthand. We also offer in-home consultations for larger projects.
